description: A alaSaaIPIterationCompleteTrap notification is sent when a IP SAA iteration
is completed.

event.Summary: IP SAA Iteration is completed and result is $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaIPIterationCompleteTrap ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaIpResultsTestRunIndex u 1 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Owner name to identify the responsiblity of the entries
in the table.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex

description: Unique name to identify the entries in the table.
The name is unique across various SNMP users.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex

description: The value of alaSaaIpResultsTestRunIndex identifies the
row entry that reports results for a single OAM test run.
The value of this object starts from 1 and can go upto a
maximum of alaSaaCtrlMaxHistoryRows.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaIpResultsTestRunIndex

description: The result of the latest SAA test iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult

description: The time at which the last iteration of the SAA was run.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime

description: A alaSaaEthIterationCompleteTrap notification is sent when a Eth-LB
or Eth-DMM SAA iteration is completed.

event.Summary: ETH-LB SAA iteration is completed with $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaEthIterationCompleteTrap ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaEthoamResultsTestRunIndex u 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Owner name to identify the responsiblity of the entries
in the table.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex

description: Unique name to identify the entries in the table.
The name is unique across various SNMP users.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex

description: The value of alaSaaEthoamResultsTestRunIndex identifies the
row entry that reports results for a single Eth-LB/DMM test run.
The value of this object starts from 1 and can go upto a
maximum of alaSaaCtrlMaxHistoryRows.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaEthoamResultsTestRunIndex

description: The result of the latest SAA test iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult

description: The time at which the last iteration of the SAA was run.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime

description: A alaSaaIPIterationCompleteTrap notification is sent when a IP SAA iteration
is completed.

event.Summary: IP SAA iteration is completed with $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacIterationCompleteTrap ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsTestRunIndex u 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Owner name to identify the responsiblity of the entries
in the table.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex

description: Unique name to identify the entries in the table.
The name is unique across various SNMP users.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex

description: The value of alaSaaMacResultsTestRunIndex identifies the
row entry that reports results for a single test run.
The value of this object starts from 1 and can go upto a
maximum of alaSaaCtrlMaxHistoryRows.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsTestRunIndex

description: The result of the latest SAA test iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult

description: The time at which the last iteration of the SAA was run.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime

description: A alaSaaPacketLossTrap notification is sent when
a packet is lost during a test.

event.Summary: Packet Loss is detected during SAA iteration

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaPacketLossTrap ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime s EXAMPLEE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsPktsSent u 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsPktsRcvd u 9999

description: Owner name to identify the responsiblity of the entries
in the table.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex

description: Unique name to identify the entries in the table.
The name is unique across various SNMP users.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex

description: The result of the latest SAA test iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult

description: The time at which the last iteration of the SAA was run.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime

description: Specifies the number of packets sent during a single MAC-Ping
iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsPktsSent

description: Specifies the number of packets received during a single MAC-Ping
iteration
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsPktsRcvd

description: A alaSaaJitterThresholdTrap notification is sent when 90% of
the Jitter Threshold is crossed.

event.Summary: 90% of SAA Jitter threshold is crossed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaJitterThresholdYellowTrap ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlOwnerIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlTestIndex s EXAMPLE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunResult i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlLastRunTime s EXAMPLEE ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaCtrlJitterThreshold i 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsAvgJitter i 9999

description: The time at which the last iteration of the SAA was run.

0 indicates it is diabled.

description: The average jitter value.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-SAA-MIB::alaSaaMacResultsAvgJitter

description: A alaSaaRTTThresholdYellowTrap notification is sent when 90% of
the RTT Threshold is crossed.

event.Summary: 90% of SAA RTT threshold is crossed
